dct_title_s: Le plan de l'Ile Anthony Vaaz. Le RÃ©ciff et terre ferme au havre de Pernambuco en Braesil
dct_alternative_sm: Grondt-Teyckening van het Eylandt Anthony Vaaz het Reciff ende vaste landt aen de haven van Pernambuco in Brasil met alle de schansen, redouten, en andere vvercken aldaer gemaeckt
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Verges de Rynlande" (also "Rhynlandtsche Roeden").
North oriented toward upper right of sheet.
Decorative cartouches, compass rose, fortification plans, vegetation, ships.
Inset map shows river on smaller scale.
Dutch title in left cartouche; Dutch scale statement underneath French scale statement in right cartouche; Dutch descriptive text throughout.
